article_title: The New Health IT Arms Race Between The US And EU

article_metadata.description: By: Nicole Fisher and Ben Heubl If you were to ask anyone in the United States what “health access” meant to them, you would get a different answer. In the UK, for most people, it means the ability to access National Health Service (NHS) amenities. To Londoner’s for example, it might [...]
